name: Land 6
description:
LAND 6 es un juego de tablero para 1 jugador con una duración aproximada de 15 minutos.
Eres el Señor de los Dados, embarcado en una batalla eterna contra el Señor de los Cubos por el control del mundo conocido como Land 6. Para derrotarlo debes conquistar su ciudad con uno de tus ejércitos, y debes lograrlo... ¡con solo seis dados!

LAND 6 is a board game for one player (a solo game) with an approximate duration of 15 minutes.
You are The Lord of the Dice, in eternal battle against The Lord of the Cubes, fighting for the world known as Land 6. To defeat him you must conquer his city with one of your armies, and you must do it... with just six dice!

LAND 6 BoardGameGeek

PREMIOS/AWARDS

2014 BGG Solitaire Print and Play Contest
2nd place Best Small Sized Game

1 Player Guild Gaming Awards 2014
3rd place Best Solitaire Print and Play Game

CREDITS/CRÉDITOS

Designed by/Diseñado por Santiago Eximeno

iOS/Android version by Boardnaut Studios

Photo/Fotografías: Boardnaut Studios y Miquel Jornet

Cover/Portada: Scott Siedschlag

Game Art/Ilustraciones: Ryan Schenk

Video: Marco Arnaudo

Icons/Iconos: Lorc
